TopicTitle: KSP .21 and Kerbal Drivers around space center.

Articles.Content:
So i downloaded .21 and loved how KSP looked. Went in to the hanger and saw the Kerbals power sliding all over the place lol. I knew the Kerbals were bad pilots but they are great Drivers. Even the big haulers power slide around the kerbals standing around. it was very amusing

Edited July 25, 2013 by Diewoe
I think they are just big slot cars, the Kerbals are just there for show (or Union reasons, one of the two)

I love how at one point at the right side entrance to the hangar, you have three loading cars perform this insane, Die-Hard style maneuver, where all three of them come impossibly close to hitting each other at very high speed but still miss somehow.
I laugh every time I see one of them sliiiddeee across the floor.

I love how at one point at the right side entrance to the hangar, you have three loading cars perform this insane, Die-Hard style maneuver, where all three of them come impossibly close to hitting each other at very high speed but still miss somehow.

I noticed that. One even speeds up just so he can have a near miss hehe.

LUDICROUS DRIFT

Its glorious. Clearly this is the best aspect of 0.21.

I need them to drive my rovers!

Come on, sign up as a Kerbonaut. It's not as dangerous as everyone says.
